features: 🍼 Upgraded Leak-Proof Design: After our use tests on children at different ages, we have improved the leak-proof and drip-free flow control valve many times, which means that your baby can easily get water without a lot of suction. And you don't have to worry about kids getting wet or dirty while drinking, keep clothes clean and dry at all times!

🍼 Easy To Carry: Our storage boxes are lightweight, small, and fit easily into your diaper bag or backpack. At the same time, it is also effective in preventing the water bottle tops from getting dusty, keeping the water bottle adapter clean at all times, and can be used by you and your family at any time without cleaning again before use.

🍼 High-Quality Material: The meticulous engineering and precise crafting of these water bottle caps, meticulously fashioned from premium-grade silicone, that is soft, flexible, and BPA-free, which is gentle on your kids' mouths, and protects them from any sharp edges or rough surfaces that could potentially harm them.

🍼 Wide Compatibility: Perfect for the standard bottled water (28mm=1.1024), especially if you have kids who like to open their own bottles. Great for family outings, travel, or when you're on the move which is a great product that will be both functional and practical and make a huge difference in your daily lives.

🍼 Carrying Ring & Different Color Design: The easy-grip handle makes it incredibly convenient for parents and little ones to hold and carry the bottle. The added feature of different colors allows for easy identification of the bottle, making it easier to know who it belongs to.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Baby Water Bottle Tops No Spill silicone Bottle Top Spout Adapter These water bottle tops are made of high quality silicone material that is BPA free and safe for your little ones to use. The design is genius and fits perfectly on a variety of water bottles, making it a versatile product for toddlers, kids and adults.
Previous page Next page 1 Foster Independence 2 Eliminating The Messy 3 Perfect For Working

No Spill Silicone Bottle Top Spout Adapter Replacement For Kids--Tested By CPSC These spouts are made from food-grade silicone and are BPA-free, so you can rest assured that your child's health is not compromised. And it can be used in the dishwasher, which is very convenient to clean.

Silicone Baby Water Bottle Cap Spout Adapter for Toddlers--Amazing Features For anyone who has handed a small disposable water bottle to a toddler. This is a very clever set of super helpful water bottle tops! They are perfect for thirsty little kids and they even come with write-on labels and a carrying ring.

These No Spill Silicone Bottle Top Spouts Are Great For Traveling! For those constantly on the go with the toddlers who make a sticky mess with any straw that isn't attached. Which makes it difficult to grab a drink while out and keep going. This adapter will change all of that! It will enable you to enjoy your beverages on the go without any spills or leaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson loves this
reviews.reviewText: Grandson feels like a big kid using these, he gets his water bottle and it looks like ours:) we love them toooo:):))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travel Essential for Toddler Hydration!
reviews.reviewText: These water bottle toppers were a lifesaver during my recent vacation with my two toddlers. They effortlessly transform any traditional water bottle into the perfect drinking outlet for little ones. My 4-year-old and 1 1/2-year-old sipped seamlessly with these toppers. The added plastic storage case keeps them clean and handy. Grateful for such ingenious inventions that make parenting on the go a breeze. Five stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter definitely uses this product when we are out and about, especially at my son's basketball games. It has come in very handy when I have forgotten her sippy cup. She has squirted it out on herself once but that was because my sister was trying to take it from her and she bit down on the top and it pulled off the bottle and got her soaked. But the product works as described and is very useful if you have a little one (my daughter is 13 months).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These water bottle tops are great. We bought them for our trip to Disney and they worked great. We each bought a bottle of water first day and just refilled it during our trip, and it made it easy for our 1 year old to stay hydrated while on vacation. We each still have them around after vacation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again! 😁
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I've had a great experience with these so far! My 18 month old can use these easily and it doesn't leak as long as it's not squeezed upside down. Definitely great to keep in the car for 'mommy forgot the sippy cup brain.' In the video I'm using a flimsy water bottle from Harris Teeter and I've also tried Walmart and Nestle and it's been a good fit. Hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Child loves it!
reviews.reviewText: Works great! use easily when I'm on the go and want to carry water around. My child loves to use it and makes no mess!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep these in my diaper bag...
reviews.reviewText: I love the convenience and portability of these spill proof caps/spouts. I keep both of them stored in the box that was included and leave it in my diaper bag. My 2 kids (both 1 and 3) have their own water bottles with a flip top straw that I usually bring whenever we go out. Sometimes we have WAY too many things to carry and will only bring one bottle if I know it's a short trip. There are times when I forget all together and will just give them water from the bottles (due to lack of straws available) which results in spillage at times. Now I don't have to worry about anything if I forget their water bottles or they run out. These spouts fit easily and tightly onto aby water standard water bottle. They stay in place, have a nice little loop to hold onto, and also has a flip top cover to prevent germs/spillage. I like that it comes with 2 different colors so I can distinguish which one belongs to which child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For older children or adults
reviews.reviewText: Not a bad product. It’s great to use with water bottles or drinks, but is easy to come out of the bottle rim, especially if you are getting it for your toddlers, I would suggest a different brand for toddlers, it’s too easy for mine to pull it straight off the bottle with their teeth.
